Author: VeryEmbarresingAlt
Text: Yeah that's something I never think about, if you eat and gain weight the next day, it's because the food you ate has sodium and other stuff that absorbs the water causing it all to be water weight which will be gone in no time.

Author: Iscariiot
Text: A lot of weight you “gained” one night of binging is water weight and will likely come off in a few days! It’s really hard to gain a pound in one sitting because of how our bodies metabolize calories. Along with that; stools, food in your gut, and the status of your menstrual cycle (if you have one) all play a role in what the scale says.   So try not to freak too much! This is all stuff I have to think about whenever I binge and it’s hard but you can get through it. I’ve yet to truly gain more than 2-3lbs binging and that was after days of doing it.
